feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:11 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 09:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -5.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -5.9°C
Wind: S 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
